api_list.name: Available Regions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com/get_regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com/get_regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: One of the region's key code in the list of **Get Regions** method.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com/get_news/v1/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com/get_news/{version}/{region}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extract Full Content
api_list.description:
Similar to scrap news article from web page.
Simply provide the url which get from Get News method.

api_list.name: Get News Images
api_list.description: Collection of images related to news article which returning from **Get News** method.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.default: Trump says he's 'glad to see' Kim Jong Un 'is back, and well!'

api_list.name: Get News Videos
api_list.description: Collection of videos related to news article which returning from **Get News** method.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.default: Trump says he's 'glad to see' Kim Jong Un 'is back, and well!'

api_list.name: Get Related News
api_list.description: Retriving related news from other source linked to the news article which returning from **Get News** method.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.default: Trump says he's 'glad to see' Kim Jong Un 'is back, and well!'
